text: Harold Kalina (July 2, 1928 - August 15, 2016) was an American lawyer, judge, and politician. Born in Minneapolis, Minnesota, Kalina went to the Minneapolis public schools. He served in the United States Army. Kalina graduated from University of Minnesota in 1949 and received his law degree from University of Minnesota Law School in 1953. He practiced law in Minneapolis. From 1955 to 1972, Kalina served in the Minnesota State Senate. He then served as a Minnesota District Court judge from 1972 to 1983 and from 1990 to 1995. Kalina died in Minneapolis, Minnesota.Minnesota Legislators Past and Present-Harold KalinaHarold Kalina-obituary ==Notes== Category:1928 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Politicians from Minneapolis Category:University of Minnesota alumni Category:University of Minnesota Law School alumni Category:Military personnel from Minnesota Category:Minnesota lawyers Category:Minnesota state court judges Category:Minnesota state senators
title: Harold Kalina
